headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Use TLS 1.3 exclusively
digest_items.why: Older TLS versions have known vulnerabilities and weaker cipher suites
digest_items.fix: Update server config to disable TLS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2 and enable only TLS 1.3

digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training

digest_items.title: Implement security incident response plan
digest_items.why: Prepared response reduces damage and recovery time from breaches
digest_items.fix: Document procedures, assign roles, and conduct regular drills

digest_items.title: Implement password complexity requirements
digest_items.why: Weak passwords are easily cracked by brute force attacks
digest_items.fix: Require minimum 12 characters with mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols

digest_items.title: Verify mobile app security
digest_items.why: Mobile apps often have unique vulnerabilities like insecure storage
digest_items.fix: Use OWASP Mobile Security Testing Guide for comprehensive testing

digest_items.title: Implement network segmentation
digest_items.why: Segmentation limits lateral movement in case of breach
digest_items.fix: Separate production, staging, and development networks with firewalls
